list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a loop of thread or yarn resulting from a single pass or movement of the needle in sewing, knitting, or crocheting.
a sudden sharp pain in the side of the body, caused by strenuous exercise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she ran with a stitch in her side
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô chạy với một mũi khâu ở bên cạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make, mend, or join (something) with stitches.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: stitch a plain seam with right sides together
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khâu một đường may trơn với hai bên phải với nhau
